title: What You’ll Need To build these Internet-related projects, you will need some common hardware, cable, and information. Let’s start with the hardware. You’ll need an Ethernet shield with the W5100 controller chip. You have two options to consider: You can use the genuine Arduino-brand Ethernet shield, as shown in Figure 19-1, or you can use an Arduino Uno–compatible board with integrated Ethernet hardware
